definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְהֵילִל]] consec. Je 47:2; [[וְהֵילִיל֫וּ]] consec. Am 8:3; Impf. [[יְיֵלִיל]] Is 15:2 + 3 t. (Ges:§ 70. 2, R. 2 Kö:i. 437, 421); [[אֲיֵלִיל]] Je 48:31; [[וְאֵילִי֫לָה]] Mic 1:8; [[יְיֵלִיל֫וּ]] Ho 7:14 (Kö:i. 421); [[יְהֵילִי֫לוּ]] Is 52:5; [[תִּיִלִי֫ל]] Is 65:14; Imv. [[הֵילֵל]] Ez Eze 21:17, Zec 11:2; [[הֵילִי֫לִי]] Is 14:31, Is 49:3 + Je 48:20 Kt; [[הֵילִי֫לוּ]] Is 13:6 + 13 t. + Je 48:20 Qr, + Ez Eze 30:2 (del. LXX Co);—utter or make a howling, give a howl, in distress, ‖[[זעק]] Ho 7:14, Je 47:2, Is 14:31, Je 25:34, Je 48:20, Je 48:31 (sq. [[על]]), Ez Eze 21:17; ‖[[חעק]] Is 65:14 (sq. [[מִן]] of occasion, source); ‖[[ספד]] Mic 1:8, Je 4:8, Joe 1:13; ‖[[הׂבִישׁ]] Joe 1:11; ‖[[בכה]] Joe 1:5 (cf. Is 15:2, Is 15:3 + [[בֶָּכִי]]); sq. [[על]] Je 51:8, Is 15:2, Is 15:3; We prop. [[ילילו]] for [[יגילו]] Ho 10:5 (others [[יחילו]], v. [[גיל]] supr. p. 162); sq. [[לְ]] Is 16:7; abs. [[והילילו שׁירות היכל]] Am 8:3 and palace-songs shall become howlings, Is 13:6, Is 16:7, Is 23:1, Is 23:6, Is 23:14, Je 48:39, Je 49:3 (Ez Eze 30:2 v. supr.), Zep 1:11, Zec 11:2, Zec 11:2; in cruel exultation Is 52:5 cf. De Che di.—On [[הֵילֵל בֶּן־שָָׁחַר]] Is 14:12 cf. sub I. [[הלל]] supr. p. 237.
